Text.Page:
The argons didn't come through here alone. They had tuwangis with them.

You know, it might be easier to get clues from the little tuwangis than the argons.

A few of them were skulking near the stream south of the watchpost. See if they have any useful clues as to what the argons intend, .

This was on the tuwangis? Let me examine this for a second.

Wait...this is made up of the same components as the mist permeating Seeliewood.

If the argons control the tuwangis with this, and the mist is the same...

Oh no, we've got a bigger problem here than anyone knew.

Are the tuwangis giving you trouble?

Or do you have a phobia of frogs?
